headlines.description: Manchester City moved back to the top of the table with a 1-0 victory over Tottenham thanks to Phil Foden's first Premier League goal.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pep touts 'genius' after Foden goal puts City top

headlines.description: Relegated Fulham ruined Eddie Howe's 500th game as a manager by beating Bournemouth 1-0 on Saturday to secure their first away win of the season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fulham stun Bournemouth in Howe's 500th game as a manager

headlines.description: Gerard Deulofeu scored in each half as Watford beat Huddersfield Town 2-1 to clinch their first Premier League away win in four games.
headlines.shortLinkText: Deulofeu double seals Watford win at Huddersfield

events.name: Leicester City at West Ham United

headlines.description: Leicester twice came from behind to grab a 2-2 draw with West Ham United at London Stadium in the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Barnes saves Leicester with injury-time equaliser at West Ham

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Wolverhampton Wanderers

headlines.description: Brighton rode their luck to secure a 0-0 draw at Wolves on Saturday, gaining a vital point in their battle to avoid relegation.
headlines.shortLinkText: Battling Brighton secure vital draw at Wolves

headlines.description: An inspired Ayoze Perez helped Newcastle United put any lingering Premier League relegation fears to bed with a hat-trick in a 3-1 win over Southamp
headlines.shortLinkText: Perez hat-trick ends Newcastle relegation fears
